name: Draughty
tagline: Share code and ideas for cryptographic entertainments.
body:
### links

constructing SAT problems: https://www.cs.uky.edu/~marek/papers.dir/11.dir/JSAT8_10_Weaver.pdf

garbled circuits implementation: https://github.com/spaceships/garbled-circuits

Mike Rosulek publications: http://dblp.uni-trier.de/pers/hd/r/Rosulek:Mike

Cuckoo Cycle memory-hard proof of work: https://eprint.iacr.org/2014/059.pdf

Momentum memory-hard proof of work: http://www.hashcash.org/papers/momentum.pdf

SipHash fast hash on short inputs: https://www.131002.net/siphash/

another garbled circuits implementation: http://cseweb.ucsd.edu/groups/justgarble/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
